titleStmt.title: Spiritual marriage: or, The vnion betweene Christ and his Church As it was delivered in a sermon at Westminster, the first of Ianuarie. Anno Dom. 1626. By Iames Baillie, Master of Arts.
titleStmt.author: Baillie, James, Master of Arts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. Favvcet, for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop, at the blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Printer's device (McK. 339) on t.p.; headpieces, initials.
The item at reel 2340:8i is ninth in a group of ten items bound and filmed together.
Imperfect: copy at reel 2340:8i lacks t.p.
Reproductions of the originals in: Cambridge University Library (reel 620:6) and Boston Public Library (reel 2340:8i).

place.placeName: his shop, at the blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard
